text: The Wright GB Hawk is a single-decker bus. It has a low-floor. It has been made from 2021 to the present day by Wrightbus. == Operators == In 2021, A GB Hawk was sent to Ipswich Buses for non-passenger trials. In 2021, Ulsterbus ordered 123 GB Hawks. == References == == Other websites == * * Wrightbus product description Category:Low-floor buses GB Hawk
title: Wright GB Hawk
